text: Hollywood Thrill Makers is a 1954 American film about stuntmen from Lippert Pictures.Seven Theaters Offer 'Sabrina' Los Angeles Times 24 Nov 1954: 14 It was also known as Hollywood Stuntmen. ==Cast== *James Gleason as Risky Russell *Bill Henry as Dave Wilson *Jean Holcombe as Joan Cummings *James Macklin as Bill Cummings *Theila Darin as Marion Russell ==Reception== The Monthly Film Bulletin called it an "Ineptly made, hashed up affair."HOLLYWOOD THRILL-MAKERS Monthly Film Bulletin; London Vol. 28, Iss. 324, (Jan 1, 1961): 170. The Los Angeles Times said "If you're interested in the antics of Hollywood stunt men, this one might interest you - but not much."REVIEW OF REVIEWS: "HOLLYWOOD THRILL MAKERS" Los Angeles Times 5 Dec 1954: E2 ==References== ==External links== * *Hollywood Thrill makers at TCMDB Category:1954 films Category:American films Category:American action films Category:English- language films Category:Lippert Pictures films Category:Films directed by Bernard B. Ray
title: Hollywood Thrill-Makers
